titles.title: Air and Health Quality Empowerment Zone Designation Act of 2018

A bill to address the health and economic development impacts of nonattainment of federally mandated air quality standards in the San Joaquin Valley, California, by designating air quality empowerment zones.
Air and Health Quality Empowerment Zone Designation Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Air and Health Quality Empowerment Zone Designation Act of 2018
This bill addresses air quality standards in certain nonattainment zones, including by allowing for the designation of air and health quality empowerment zones and by providing grants for replacing or retrofitting polluting vehicles or engines.
